channel.title: Java blocks my server
channel.description: So i put my server on rspscoding.org and rswebclients.com so my friends could see if they can find any bugs etc. Well...On rswebclients when my friend tried to download the cache on the webclient, his anti-virus program blocked it. And then he tried rspscoding.org and it worked perfectly...but when some other friends tried, java blocked it. My server isn't a virus..Is it something wrong or just the websites are fucked up?

item.title: Java blocks my server
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Probably to do with the applet being self-signed or something similar. I doubt it’s your fault.

Read full topic

item.title: Java blocks my server
item.dc:creator: @Cuber317 Cuber317
item.description:
@Cuber317 wrote:

So i put my server on rspscoding.org and rswebclients.com so my friends could see if they can find any bugs etc.
Well…On rswebclients when my friend tried to download the cache on the webclient, his anti-virus program blocked it.
And then he tried rspscoding.org and it worked perfectly…but when some other friends tried, java blocked it.
My server isn’t a virus…Is it something wrong or just the websites are fucked up?
